scripts.build: npm run prepare && zip -r ./weather-api.zip . -x '.*.test*' -x '*.git*' && aws s3 rm s3://vixay-lambdas/weather-api.zip && aws s3 cp weather-api.zip s3://vixay-lambdas/weather-api.zip
scripts.deploy: npm run build && aws cloudformation deploy --region us-west-2 --template-file ./cloudformation/weather-api-resources.yaml --stack-name weather-api-lambda --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
scripts.coverage: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
